resources.string:
The Game is Simple 


 - Play either Rock, Paper, Or Scissors against the opponent by pressing the corresponding buttons 

 - Press start to let the computer play its choice to play against you 

 - If you win, you will get the point. If the computer wins, it will get the point 

 - If you and the computer pick the same choice, no points will be awarded and the round is replayed 

 - First to 5 points wins the game
CREATED BY: HENDRE LEIGH O. SAGABAEN
